author: Anthony Eckstorm
comment: It would be awesome to allow digital and analog at the same time. Also appointments to show. So if I have meeting scheduled it would show up in the time ring similar to the lunch time. Some sort extended appointment view because android wear does notify me if I have a upcoming appointment soon.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Anthony, thank you for your feedback. I'd like to invite you to my Google Plus page (link at the bottom of app description). I've confirmed many future updates including calendar events. Hope you'll enjoy :)

title: Great watch app. Love it.

author: Josh Chesarek
comment: I just bought a copy of your watch face and I am very pleased. Have you thought about interfacing with the calendar so you can show busy times throughout the day like you do with the lunch break?

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Yes, this actually is the milestone for one of future updates, not sure if I would make it in 4.0 (plans for this version are numerous), but in 5.0 it is a must :) Follow Atektura Watch Faces on Google+, I'm going to announce some details soon. Thanks, enjoy the app :)

title: Very cool but could do something awesome

author: Jon Bross
comment: The app is great and has a lot of customization but it would be nice to set individual times for each week day. I have one day in my week which is different than the others. Also please add option for break times in addition to lunch.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Jon, this is all on my to-do list already, if you want to know more, just visit Atektura Watch Faces on Google+, there is a post where i confirmed many future features. Thank you, enjoy the app :)

title: Great App - Small Suggestion

author: Kollin VanDenHeuvel
comment: Using about 10% of battery for moto 360. It is the highest battery user of all on my watch. Higher than screen. Getting about 12 hours is all.  Edit- The first two days this watch face was the highest battery user but since it has dropped down and I am getting normal battery life again!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: You may try Pitch Black skin, or at least night mode and ticking second hand. It should increase battery life noticeably. I use LG G Watch R, it keeps 2 days battery, so maybe disabling ambient mode will help (Moto has lcd screen which consumes much power too). Sorry for having such experience, you are first user to have battery issues with 9to5 :(

title: Edit- First 2 days had poor battery seems better now

author: Steven Post
comment: I work 11pm to 7am, but putting that in, the info tells me I have 30 hours left to my shift. I hope not! So for right now I have to leave the text off. The visual elements still work for me plenty. Just a shame the text is acting up for me..
title: Small night shift quirk

author: Sean Donovan
comment: This app is worthless to me until individual times can be assigned to each day, keep in mind each week is different times too. Would be great if it can use data from Google Calendar.
title: Useless if you work at different times

author: Anton Gorkounov
comment: I originally had a five star review. But it's clear that the developer has stopped giving updates to this and still hasn't kept his promises. If the developer does update I'll change this to a 5.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: I know, my bad, you're upset, and it's totally right, I won't make any more promisses, there's no need to make any, but just believe me - an update will be ready some day. I'm just stuck with some unsolved problems, but still working on this app. Maybe your one-star opinion will push me to speed up :)

title: Has not been updated for almost a year

author: Sebastian Lavender
comment: I like the look of it but its shame you can't have individual times for each day and the app hasn't been updated for months UPDATE: doesn't work on night shifts with a break

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: I'm just one to care about dozen watch faces. This one is, somehow, complete. I'm proud of it. No bugs, nor errors, just needs new features (list of them is on my Google+ page). Yes, last update was uploaded 2 months ago, but another is coming in may, so 2-star review is too harmful :( - I haven't been promising anything I didn't made into the app.

title: Looks good

author: Andy Smith
comment: Great watch face, use it all the time now, the only thing that it needs to get full stars is the ability to add in morning and afternoon coff break times aswell as i get 2 15 minute breaks aswell as lunch.
title: Almost perfect

author: Santtos Alexander Luchian
comment: Very nice but I had one problem, my lunch break have 90 min and the setting is max 60 min. Maybe even more colors or manual color scheme. Can you make something about it ? Thanks

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Longer breaks and more are coming in the next update. "Designer" mode for all custom colors will be implemented later. Thank you, Maciej

author: oancea valentin
comment: Great job with this app... Especially with the latest update.. I must admit when I first tried I thought it was amazing but then I got a bit bored because of the lack of customization so I had to change to other watch faces that offered more...latest additions tho made it jump back to my wrist again!  :)
title: Great...

author: Jeff Williams
comment: I enjoy the black and white ones the best. My only two suggestions would be an option to vibrate (when you shift begins /ends and when you're lunch is nearing the end) and an option to customize the colors so we can get the colors we want ( like favorite sports teams ). Otherwise Great watch face guys
title: Great watch face!

comment: Amazing app, does everything I want! But I do have two small things that bug me and that's the second transition from ambient mode to active mode the screen is black and without color then switches back and it just bugs the crap out of me! The other one is to change the number/letter size of everything.

author: Mario Augusto Felipe Santos-Ramos
comment: Looks like a nice watch face but it always crashes when I try to set it up so I never use it on my LG G watch R.
title: Crashes on lg g watch r

author: Nate Gardner
comment: The app doesn't actually have a watchface. Just an app where you can customize a clock. The clock is really cool, but why can't I use it as a watchface on my Android Wear watch? It appears this is only compatible with Android Wear 1.x

author: Rob Earls
comment: But "OK Google" appears in an awkward place, would be better at bottom left.  Nice work otherwise😀
title: Very nice

author: azemsah arslan
comment: Hi, change phone language from turkish to english its working.   Good watch face... Thanks...                        Old comment "Not working in lg g4  Not working in lg g4 and huwaei watch, stop working."

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Please send me some more detailed info: contact@atektura.watch

title: new comment :)

author: Jerry Freter
comment: I work Monday through Thursday.  It will not keep Friday marked as day off. I factory reset the watch and it seems fine.   It would be fun to put in vacation time or holidays just to give advice about goofing off.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Additional feedback will be appreciated, please contact me via email: contact@atektura.watch

title: Still had bugs

author: Chris Malkiewicz
comment: But really need to remove icon from app drawer. EDIT: I received your reply THANKS! But that's the beauty of Android... Widgets don't need icons... Long press to set any widget then just tap on said widget to bring up setting... So much more useful then cluttering up app drawer. But again great watch face!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Actually, yes, there is. From 3.0 the app also offers a widget which is customized from the same app. Widget doesn't need a watch face to be on a smartwatch. It is also a better way to access settings for those users who change options more often.

title: Great Watch Face

author: Abdulla S.B
comment: Thanks after the update I like the watch more and more. Thanks for the devolper . please try to add the 1 minutes precision to set the starting work time ( it will be good for people who have flixable work timing like me)

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, all of that functionalities and many more, will be soon available with few updates, so stay tuned. I'm working hard on this to make it available as soon as possible :) EDIT 3.0 update is already uploaded. Will be ready for download in hours :)

title: Cool watch

author: Brandon Adkins
comment: I love the concept of this app. But I work overnights so when I try and set it it doesn't register that it's am and pm. Would really love that option. Other than that it's greatm

author: David Güiza Caicedo
comment: Nice looking and practical. I love the info messages. Can we add a "time to go to work" option? A little vibration notifying it's time to leave to catch your train/bus would be awesome :-D﻿ Good job guys, keep it up!
title: Works like a charm!

author: Alex Richman
comment: Being able to customize things that it says like "grab a beer" to something else would be nice. I would also like to be able to see my phone's battery as well as the watch's.
title: Needs more customization

author: Nestor Irizarry
comment: Very good. Many of the complaints from the past version have been addressed in the recent update.

author: Max Sergeyenko
comment: It's different hours every day. Make it so we could set different starting times and lengths of work and lunch times for different day. (U cna have a switch that would say "Same time for every day" and if u uncheck that then we could set different times for different day, thanks!!! :)

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: That's what I'm working on for a long time, it's almost ready, stay tuned!

title: Have u heard of a part time job???

author: Srikanth Reddy
comment: After installing, switch off Bluetooth and Turn Back on. Also Disable the phone developer options. Then it will sync any watch face...

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: First of all make sure your watch battery is well charged (with low battery a smartwatch may not synchronize with a smartphone). Second, when the watch face doesn't appear, you might need to force-sync via Android Wear app. If you need any more help, please contact me: contact@atektura.watch

title: Good Watch Face.. Took some time to Sync

author: Ryan Barnes
comment: This watchface is wicked! Such a cool concept, I love it. Really clean design - i'm so impressed. A perfect example of what Android Wear can do... Going to show off to all my friends! Great job.

author: Richard Ely-Harris
comment: Great watch. Love the countdown scale around the edge. Would love the option to change some of the messages that come up at certain times.
title: Great watch

author: Ian Bowers
comment: Love the concept. A dark theme option would be fun, but as it is it's still great. EDIT: Dev delivered on my suggestion!  I'd give it a 6th star, but that's crazy talk.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: 3.0 update is already uploaded. Will be ready for download in hours :)

title: Fantastic

author: Barnaby Collins
comment: However, I would really like it if you gave us the option of stopping the top notification from being visible in the "dimmed" screen mode. Thanks!
title: Cool watchface

author: Daniel Jorge
comment: Great job on the update.
title: Still makes me laugh

author: daniel campion
comment: I would love this if I could customise start time, lunch time(s) ect for each day individually. Not much to ask for the price.
title: Could be more versatile

author: Neal Syrkel
comment: Awesome. After newest update the dev has addressed everybody's requests and this is now my primary watch face. How about an area on face for weather. That'd be cool too

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: 3.0 update is already uploaded. Will be ready for download in hours :)

title: The best

author: Hyungsub Yim
comment: I would like it to be more flexible.
title: Lunch break time limited to 60 min

author: Stephen Hurley
comment: I really so like this watchface. I do work different hours several days of the week, so being able to set work times for different days would be great. Other than that, solid watch face.

author: Andy Rauseo
comment: Will give 5 start if you add the ability to set the time individually for each day. My schedule change every week.
title: Nice app...but?

author: Maxx Rodriguez
comment: Unnecessary battery drain for the LG G Watch in ambient mode.
title: Lg G Watch

author: Alex O'Brien
comment: I would like to set different hours for every day that I work. It would be 5 stars for sure and my daily goto watch face.
title: Differing daily schedule

author: Michael Rák
comment: Excellent, but needs options for breaks and/or no break/lunch.
title: Good, but needs adjusted

author: Andy Roberts
comment: Amazing app, so many options!  Would like a square watch face to match my watch.
title: Great but needs a dark theme
